title: engum niraindirukkum
sahitya:
engum niraindirukkum en deivam ellAm arindirukkum en deivam
pongi varum karuNai mazhai pozhiyum poi ariyA manadil


caraNam    tangi pagizhndiruppAn dayALan tanakkoru payan karudAn
mangaLamE taruvAn aDiyavar manam ninai vaDivam koLvAn
vArIr avan tAL pugazhndu pADuvOm onRu
 shErIr sadAnanda vAzhvu kUDuvOm
